body_html: One question I have is when Bazel support is actually arriving on Windows. Looking at the Bazel repository it says they are planning to support Android in Windows, but I didn't see any reference to building (what I assume are) native packages.
body_text: One question I have is when Bazel support is actually arriving on Windows.  Looking at the Bazel repository it says they are planning to support Android in Windows, but I didn't see any reference to building (what I assume are) native packages.
body: One question I have is when Bazel support is actually arriving on Windows.  Looking at the Bazel repository it says they are planning to support Android in Windows, but I didn't see any reference to building (what I assume are) native packages.
